div.span: ​​​​​Information about the coronavirus (COVID-19) is frequently updated by the Center for Disease Control (CDC) and the Santa Clara County Public Health Department. Officials from the Santa Clara County Office of Education are in constant communication with Public Health Department officials and our county's school district leaders to make sure the most recent and accurate information is available.
Click the box below to see the latest updates regarding COVID-19 in Santa Clara County.

p.strong: For the latest updates and guidance on COVID-19 from Santa Clara County Public Health Department​

address.p:
1290 Ridder Park Drive
San Jose, CA 95131
(408) 453-6500
